segments.text: ... I knew it . I always knew you were a lesbian !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She's my roommate , not my date . The D-man , as in dork .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Haha . Still got that great sense of humor , I see . Here's my card . I sell used cars . A car from us is a car you can trust !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alrighty then . Didn't you use to date Sheryl ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sweet little lassie . Yep , broke her heart when the D-man told her he couldn't be a one-woman guy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ? I heard she dumped you . Anyway , she's right over there . Oh , Sheryl !
segments.speaker: S2
